alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida, southwestern Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 342 PM EDT/242 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blountstown, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Kennys Mill, Rock Bluff, Nettle Ridge, Selman, Woods, Torreya State Park, Hugh Creek and Roy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
